lejos.robotics.filter

Class SumFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • lejos.robotics.filter.AbstractFilter
      • lejos.robotics.filter.SumFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SampleProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeanFilter

    public class SumFilter
extends AbstractFilter
    This filter returns the sum of the N most recent samples.
    The number of samples used is specified in the constructor of the filter.
    Author:
    Aswin
